column2: ENGLISH

I can feel their eyes upon me everywhere I go: disappointment, despise. I gathered my vassals and, upon my honor, pledged peace for my realm. Now, I've broken that pledge. My reasons be damned: they won't listen, and my reputation amongst them and the greater realm will suffer for my trespass.
I suppose that's the price I must pay.

Thanks in part to my own efforts, the majority of the population in [emf_province.GetName] has finally begun to adopt the customs and language of my native culture. This will make it easier to manage [emf_province.GetName] and allow it to enjoy higher tax and military efficiency.
Excellent! Eventually, the world will speak [Root.Culture.GetName]...
While I appreciate the world's many cultures, this will serve me.
Your time and effort spent upon converting a province to the [Root.Religion.GetName] Faith has taught you a thing or two along the way.

Pledge Peace to My Vassals

[This.GetTitledFirstName] commits to no offensive war for §Y15§! years. In return, [This.GetSubjectPronoun] will appreciate significantly improved vassal opinion and a strong liege levy boost for the pledge's duration. [This.GetSubjectPronounCap] will face a penalty if [This.GetPossPronoun] pledge is canceled prematurely, but it may nevertheless be canceled within §Y1§! year if [This.GetSubjectPronoun] absolutely must go to war.

§MNOTE:§! Participating in a faction revolt doesn't break the pledge UNLESS leading the rebellion. Likewise, joining wars as an ally does NOT break the pledge.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to see the authority of the §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§! Religion strengthened, as it is currently below §Y30%§!.
column3: [This.Get_Le_Title][This.GetTitledFirstName] veut voir l'autorité de la religion §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§! renforcée, puisqu'elle est actuellement en dessous de §Y30%§!.
column4: [This.GetTitledFirstName] möchte die Autorität der §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]en§! Religion gestärkt sehen, da sie momentan niedriger als §Y30%§! ist.
column6: [This.GetTitledFirstName] quiere ver reforzada la autoridad del §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§!, pues ahora mismo está debajo del §Y30%§!.

§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! wins a war.

To complete the ambition you need to perform §Y3§! of the following tasks:
 §Y*§! Win a Holy War
 §Y*§! Successfully defend against a Holy War
 §Y*§! Construct a Temple
 §Y*§! Convert a Province to [This.Religion.GetName]

Note that you can complete the same task multiple times.

Tasks currently completed: §G[This.strengthen_religion.GetValue]§!
column3:
Pour compléter l'ambition, vous devez exécuter §Y3§! des tâches suivantes:
§Y*§! Gagner une guerre sainte
§Y*§! Se défendre avec succès contre une guerre sainte
§Y*§! Construire un temple
§Y*§! Convertir un comté à la religion [This.Religion.GetName] 

Notez que vous pouvez accomplir la même tâche plusieurs fois.

Les tâches actuellement terminées: §G[This.strengthen_religion.GetValue]§!
column4:
Um diese Ambition zu erfüllen, müsst Ihr §Y3§! der folgenden Aufgaben ausführen:
 §Y*§! Einen Heiligen Krieg gewinnen
 §Y*§! Erfolgreich einen Heiligen Krieg verteidigen
 §Y*§! Einen Tempel bauen
 §Y*§! Eine Provinz zu [This.Religion.GetName] konvertieren

Beachte, dass die gleiche Aufgabe mehrmals erfüllt werden kann.

Momentan abgeschlossen: §G[This.strengthen_religion.GetValue]§!
column6:
Para cumplir esta ambición debes realizar §Y3§! de las tareas siguientes:
 §Y*§! Ganar una Guerra santa
 §Y*§! Defenderte exitosamente contra una Guerra santa
 §Y*§! Construir un templo
 §Y*§! Convertir una provincia al [This.Religion.GetName]

Observa que puedes cumplir la misma tarea varias veces.

Tareas completadas actualmente: §G[This.strengthen_religion.GetValue]§!

column2: Grant Estates
Grant landed estates to this character. This will give them a monthly revenue and make them more loyal to you.
Consider the size of the estate that will be granted to §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! (you will also have the opportunity to reconsider, if you wish).\n
Request Estates
Request Estates
Request estates to provide you an income from your landed relative.

column2: I have arranged for the sale of my old estates so that I can concentrate my wealth in the lands that I now hold.
column3: Je me suis arrangé pour vendre mes anciens domaines afin que je puisse consacrer ma richesse aux terres que je détiens.
column4: Ich habe den Verkauf meinen alten Anwesen angeordnet, so dass ich meinen Reichtum zu den Ländern, die ich jetzt halte, zusammen sammeln kann.

column2: Today, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] asked me for landed estates to live off...
column3: Aujourd'hui, mon [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] m'a demandé la permission de quitter de château familiale et souhaiterai que je lui accorde un domaine ..
column4: Heute hat mein [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] mich dazu gebittet [From.GetHerHim] Grundbesitz zu geben um davon zu Leben...

column2: I gave [From.GetHerHim] what [From.GetSheHe] wanted
column3: Je lui ai donné ce qu'[From.GetSheHe] voulait

column2: I told [From.GetHerHim] I could not afford it...
column3: Je lui ai dit que je ne pourrais pas me le permettre ...
column4: Ich sagte [From.GetHerHim] das ich es nicht gewähren könnte...
